original_text:
Lightning Leopard
La velocità è il tema portante di questa slot prodotta dalla Lightning Box Gaming, software house assai innovativa presente sul mercato dal 2004, che nel tempo ha sfornato slot machine di altissimo valore e molto interessanti. Come dice il nome, i protagonisti di Lightning Leopard sono il leopardo delle nevi e il fulmine. Ambientata in Nepal, a farci compagnia durante il gioco ci sono altri animali tipici della zona come l’orso bruno, il lupo bianco e lo stambecco, ma non manca la presenza umana con la bella cacciatrice nepalese.
Una particolare attenzione è stata prestata alla grafica, con i simboli che sono ben definiti e numerose animazioni che accompagnano le vincite e i giochi Bonus. La musica che fa da colonna sonora al gioco è quella tipica del Nepal, riprodotta dai  flauti di pan a otto tubi, e dal suono tipico della rotazione dei rulli. Dietro la griglia di gioco si intravedono le vette innevate dei monti e nella parte sottostante troviamo il tasto per accedere al menù, i pulsanti per aumentare o diminuire il valore della nostra scommessa e quello per attivare i giri automatici. Sul lato destro vengono indicati i valori dei 4 jackpot a disposizione.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La griglia di Lightning Leopard ha una strutta classica con 5 rulli e 3 righe. La puntata minima è di 0,40 €, la massima di 50 €, con 40 linee di gioco fisse  e un ritorno teorico al giocatore o RTP pari a 95,52%, non molto alto ma nella media delle slot machine prodotte da questo provider. È possibile impostare da 5 a 100 giri automatici e disattivarli in ogni momento per tornare al gioco manuale.
Simboli e funzionalità di Lightning Leopard
In Lightning Leopard si vince quando compaiono almeno 3 simboli in una combinazione vincente da sinistra a destra su rulli consecutivi, partendo dal primo rullo a sinistra. Se si ottengono più combinazioni vincenti su linee diverse i premi vengono sommati, se abbiamo più combinazioni su una stessa linea, verrà pagata la più alta. I simboli che pagano meno sono quelli relativi alle figure delle carte da gioco fino all’Asso. Subito dopo troviamo il lupo e il fiocco di neve, lo stambecco, l’orso, la cacciatrice nepalese. Il simbolo Wild è il leopardo delle nevi che, oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, è anche il simbolo che paga di più in assoluto. Una menzione particolare dobbiamo farla per i fulmini: da 6 e sino a 13 simboli attivano la funzione Respin Lightning, ossia vengono assegnati 3 giri gratuiti durante i quali i fulmini rimarranno fissi mentre a ruotare saranno tutte le altre posizioni. I fulmini che compariranno durante i giri gratuito daranno diritto ad altri 3 Respin, al termine dei quali i fulmini verranno sostituti dai premi. Se durante il Respin Lightning compariranno 15 fulmini, allora verrà attivata la funzione Flippin’ Lightning, che garantisce un premio per ogni posizione. Durante questi giochi Bonus è possibile ricevere in modo del tutto casuale uno dei Jackpot: Mini, Minor, Major, Grand.

raw_translation.response:
Lightning Leopard
Speed is the focus of this slot game produced by Lightning Box Gaming, an innovative software company present in the market since 2004. Over time, the company has produced high-value and very interesting slot machines. As the name suggests, the protagonists of Lightning Leopard are the snow leopard and lightning. Set in Nepal, other animals typical of the area such as brown bears, white wolves, and ibexes accompany us during the game. However, the presence of a beautiful Nepalese huntress cannot be missed.
Special attention has been paid to the graphics, with well-defined symbols and numerous animations that accompany winnings and bonus games. The music that serves as the game's soundtrack is typical of Nepal, played by eight-tube pan flutes and the typical sound of the reels spinning. Behind the game grid, we can catch a glimpse of the snowy peaks of the mountains, and at the bottom, we find the button to access the menu, the buttons to increase or decrease the value of our bet, and the one to activate automatic spins. The values of the 4 jackpots available are indicated on the right side.
Main characteristics of the slot machine
Lightning Leopard's grid has a classic structure with 5 reels and 3 rows. The minimum bet is €0.40, and the maximum is €50, with 40 fixed paylines and a theoretical return to player or RTP of 95.52%, not very high, but within the average of slot machines produced by this provider. It is possible to set from 5 to 100 automatic spins and deactivate them at any time to return to manual play.
Symbols and features of Lightning Leopard
In Lightning Leopard, you win when at least 3 symbols appear in a winning combination from left to right on consecutive reels, starting from the first reel on the left. If you get multiple winning combinations on different lines, prizes are added up. If you have multiple combinations on the same line, the highest one will be paid. The symbols that pay the least are those related to playing card figures up to the Ace. Right after, we find the wolf and the snowflake, the ibex, the bear, and the Nepalese huntress. The Wild symbol is the snow leopard that, in addition to replacing all symbols except the Scatter, is also the symbol that pays the most. We must make a special mention of the lightning bolts: from 6 up to 13 symbols, activate the Respin Lightning function, which assigns 3 free spins during which the lightning bolts will remain fixed while all other positions will rotate. The lightning bolts that appear during the free spins will entitle you to 3 more respins, at the end of which the lightning bolts will be replaced by prizes. If 15 lightning bolts appear during Respin Lightning, Flippin' Lightning will be activated, which guarantees a prize for each position. During these bonus games, it is possible to receive one of the jackpots entirely by chance: Mini, Minor, Major, Grand.

raw_translation.response:
Experience the thrill of speed with Lightning Leopard, the latest slot game from innovative software house, Lightning Box Gaming. Since 2004, Lightning Box Gaming has consistently produced high-quality and exciting slot machines, and this one is no exception. Inspired by Nepal, Lightning Leopard features the majestic snow leopard and lightning bolts as its main symbols. Joining them on the reels are other native animals such as brown bears, white wolves, and mountain goats, as well as a beautiful Nepalese huntress. 

The graphics are stunning, with highly defined symbols and animations that accompany wins and bonus games. The music is also fittingly Nepalese, played on eight-tube pan flutes, and the sound of the reels spinning adds to the overall excitement of the game. The snow-capped peaks of the mountains are visible behind the game grid, and the buttons for accessing the menu, adjusting your bet, and activating auto spins are easy to find. On the right-hand side, you can keep track of the four available jackpots. 

Lightning Leopard features a classic grid structure with five reels and three rows. The minimum bet is 0.40 €, and the maximum bet is 50 €, with 40 fixed paylines and a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 95.52%, which is on par with the average of other slot machines from this provider. You can set auto spins to anywhere from five to 100 turns and easily disable them at any time to return to manual play. 

To win on Lightning Leopard, you need to land at least three symbols in a winning combination from left to right on consecutive reels, starting from the first reel on the left. If you hit multiple winning combinations on different paylines, your prizes will be added together. If you hit multiple winning combinations on the same payline, only the highest one will be paid out. The lowest paying symbols are the card faces, from Jack to Ace. Next come the wolf and snowflake, mountain goat, brown bear, and the Nepalese huntress. The wild symbol is the snow leopard, which can substitute for all other symbols except the scatter and pays out the most. 

Lightning Leopard's standout feature is Respin Lightning, triggered when you land six to 13 lightning bolt symbols. You'll get three free spins, during which the lightning bolt symbols will remain fixed while the other positions spin. Any lightning bolt symbols that appear during the free spins will give you an additional three respins, and at the end, the lightning bolt symbols will be replaced with prizes. If you land 15 lightning bolt symbols, you'll trigger Flippin' Lightning, which guarantees a prize for every position. During these bonus games, you also have the chance to win one of the jackpots randomly: Mini, Minor, Major, or Grand. 

Experience the thrill of the chase with Lightning Leopard - will you catch your prey and take home the jackpot?

Review:
 
Lightning Leopard slot game

Lightning Leopard is a slot game produced by Lightning Box Gaming, featuring the snow leopard and lightning. Set in Nepal, other typical animals of the area such as brown bears, white wolves, and ibexes accompany us during the game.

Gameplay and rules

Lightning Leopard's grid has a classic structure with 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 40 fixed paylines, and the minimum bet is €0.40, while the maximum is €50. The theoretical return to player or RTP is 95.52%. Winning combinations are achieved when 3 or more symbols appear in a consecutive order from left to right on the reels. The Wild symbol is the snow leopard that pays the most. The Respin Lightning function is triggered by collecting 6 up to 13 lightning bolts, which results in 3 free spins during which the lightning bolts remain fixed while all other positions will rotate.

Graphics and soundtrack

The graphics of Lightning Leopard are impressive, with well-defined symbols and numerous animations that accompany winnings and bonus games. The soundtrack is typical of Nepal, played by eight-tube pan flutes and the typical sound of the reels spinning. The background displays the snowy peaks of the mountains, and at the bottom, we find the button to access the menu, the buttons to increase or decrease the value of our bet, and the one to activate automatic spins.

Special features and bonuses

Lightning Leopard offers a variety of exciting special features and bonuses. Respin Lightning function is activated by collecting 6 up to 13 lightning bolts, which results in 3 free spins during which the lightning bolts remain fixed while all other positions will rotate. The lightning bolts that appear during the free spins will entitle you to 3 more respins, at the end of which the lightning bolts will be replaced by prizes. If 15 lightning bolts appear during Respin Lightning, Flippin' Lightning will be activated, which guarantees a prize for each position. During these bonus games, it is possible to receive one of the jackpots entirely by chance: Mini, Minor, Major, Grand.

Software provider - Lightning Box Gaming

Lightning Box Gaming is the innovative software company behind the Lightning Leopard slot game. It has been present in the market since 2004 and has produced high-value and interesting slot machines over time.
